column2: Further,  I  do  not  see  any  wrong  in  the  manner  in  which  the  learned

column1: High  Court  Judge  has  considered  the  facts  and  the  way  in  which  she  has
applied the law in this instance.

column2: F or the  above stated reasons, I see no basis to interfere with the Order
made  by the  learned High Court Judge.  Therefore,  I affirm the Order of the

column1: Appeal is accordingly dismissed with costs.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
